subject: Securitization of future cash flow in BOT (Annuity) Projects.
text: Hr7 <icly TTTHTf yfearur 11-25074100/25074200 (Hst Wrar- 3 tratrrf 44144) 25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 Q 6, #r-10, aat, T farit-110075 6-5 & 6,Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Securitization of future cash flow in BOT (Annuity) Projects/2o17 No. 8.3.31/2017, Dated the 20th September, 2017 Sub: Securitization of future cash flow in BOT (Annuity) Projects. The applicability of circular no_ NHAIICGM (F8A)2013 dated 29.05.2013 (copy enclosed) on Securitization of future cash flow in BOT (Toll) Projects" to BOT (Annuity) projects was examined in the 316th meeting of Executive Committee. 2 Executive Committee in its 316th meeting held on 08.09.2017 vide item no 316.01 has decided that circular no. NHAIICGM (F&A)2013 dated 29.05.2013 (including all the conditions mentioned therein) shall also be applicable in case of BOT (Annuity) projects. Encl: As above. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) To AIl Officers and Employees of HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices (AK;
